About Me

Biography

I am 23 years old. From Serbia, Belgrade. Self-taught junior frontend developer who is in love with code. With every line of code I strive to make web a beautiful place. Passionate animal and nature lover.

My goals

In this moment I am improving all the code. I want it to be clean understandable code with newest features. Also, learning React, so i am at the begining of the journey of becoming a good developer with great skills. Main goal is to learn something new every day and make projects I would be proud of.
